detail_desc: Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Set with a long-sleeved jersey top, long-sleeved sweatshirt and pair of trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric.
